txt.en: Prying the Hand Back
Plant Mizâdi's banner in the centre of Garash Kâru
Return to Mizâdi in Iridír with news of your success
Destroyed barricades at Garash Kâru ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Defeat Ekhamâti cat-keepers at Garash Kâru ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Defeated Ekhamâti cat-keepers at Garash Kâru ([placeholder]/[placeholder])

'Now is the time for our counter-attack. Bârshud has driven his forces as far as Garash Kâru, at the southern border of Ambarûl. Before he finishes fortifying his position, I would ask you, [placeholder], to go with some of the Subuzûri and sweep through the camp. Expel him from Ambarûl before he can dig in.\n\n'This is our utmost priority at this moment, friend.'
Enter Garash Kâru in southern Ambarûl
'Thank you for your haste in seeking me out. I received a disturbing report from one of my scouts that I would discuss with you.'
Defeated Ekhamâti look-outs at Garash Kâru ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Defeated Ekhamâti sorcerers at Garash Kâru ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Mizâdi has asked you to conduct a daring raid on Garash Kâru, the Ekhamâti encampment providing a foothold for Bârshud into Ambarûl.
Destroy barricades and defeat Ekhamâti at Garash Kâru in Ambarûl. Garash Kâru can be found due south of Iridír.
Defeat Ekhamâti cat-keepers at Garash Kâru ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Defeat Ekhamâti look-outs at Garash Kâru ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Defeat Rumûza at Garash Kâru in Ambarûl.
Defeat Ekhamâti sorcerers at Garash Kâru ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Plant Mizâdi's banner in the centre of Garash Kâru.
Defeat Rumûza at Garash Kâru
Speak with Mizâdi in Urmâkh
Return to Mizâdi in Iridír with news of the fall of Garash Kâru.
Destroy barricades at Garash Kâru ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Travel to Garash Kâru in southern Ambarûl. Garash Kâru can be found south-west of Iridír, over the river Ikorbân.
Defeated Ekhamâti cat-keepers at Garash Kâru ([placeholder]/[placeholder])

'This is a great victory indeed, [placeholder]! Our first real victory since Kûr Anzar.\n\n'Now with his forces pushed back, we have some needed breathing room to plan an assault on Bârshud's encampment, wherever that is. My scouts are currently scouring Khûd Zagin, looking for the source of his operations. But that is for another day. Today, I am heartened, friend.'
